trans-unit.source: Manages user interface in the designer.
trans-unit.target: Gestisce l'interfaccia utente nella finestra di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> is created, it adds a transparent window over the designer frame.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> viene creato, aggiunge una finestra trasparente sulla cornice della finestra di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> can then use this window to render user interface elements, called <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects, as well as catch all mouse messages.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> può quindi utilizzare questa finestra per il rendering di elementi dell'interfaccia utente, denominati <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> oggetti, nonché catch tutti i messaggi del mouse.

trans-unit.source: In this way, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> can control designer behavior.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> possibile controllare il comportamento della finestra di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class supports a behavior stack, onto which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> objects can be pushed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe supporta uno stack di comportamento, in cui <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> oggetti possono essere inseriti.

trans-unit.source: When a message is intercepted through the transparent window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> can send the message to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> at the top of the stack.
trans-unit.target: Quando un messaggio viene intercettato attraverso la finestra trasparente, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> può inviare il messaggio di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> nella parte superiore dello stack.

trans-unit.source: This enables different user interface modes depending on the currently pushed <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo la modalità di interfaccia utente diverso a seconda attualmente inserito <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> is used to render all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects, such as selection borders, sizing handles, and smart tags.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> viene utilizzato per eseguire il rendering di tutti i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> oggetti, ad esempio i bordi di selezione, punti di ridimensionamento e smart tag.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> also controls many design-time behaviors, such as using snaplines, dragging, and selecting.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> controlla inoltre molti comportamenti in fase di progettazione, ad esempio tramite le guide di allineamento, selezionando e trascinando.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [Cenni preliminari sul servizio comportamento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create your own <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> based class that responds to user clicks.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come creare la propria <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> basato su classe che risponde ai clic dell'utente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: A collection of adorner.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di strumenti decorativi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A> property provides access to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection> managed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A> fornisce l'accesso a proprietà di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection> gestiti dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> objects to and remove them from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come aggiungere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> oggetti e rimuoverli da un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorServiceAdornerCollection>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio di codice fa parte di un esempio più esaustivo disponibile per la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> for the adorner window.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> per la finestra di strutturazione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> for the adorner window.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> per la finestra di strutturazione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> value to transform.
trans-unit.target: Valore <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> da trasformare.

trans-unit.source: Translates a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> in the adorner window to screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Converte un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> nella finestra di strutturazione in coordinate dello schermo.

trans-unit.source: The transformed <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> value, in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Valore di <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> trasformato, espresso in coordinate dello schermo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the location of the adorner window in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la posizione della finestra di strumenti decorativi, in coordinate dello schermo.

trans-unit.source: The location, from the upper-left corner of the adorner window, in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Posizione, dall'angolo superiore sinistro della finestra di strumenti decorativi, in coordinate dello schermo.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> starts a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> avvia un'operazione di trascinamento e rilascio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.BeginDrag> event immediately before it starts a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> genera il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.BeginDrag> evento immediatamente prima che avvia un'operazione di trascinamento e rilascio.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [gestione e generazione di eventi](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to translate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> da convertire.

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> delimitatore di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />.

trans-unit.source: The bounding <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> translated to the adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> delimitatore di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> convertito in coordinate della finestra Adorner.

trans-unit.source: The adorner window is a transparent window that resides on top of the designer's frame.
trans-unit.target: La finestra adorner è una finestra trasparente che si trova sopra la cornice della finestra di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: This window is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> to intercept all messages.
trans-unit.target: Questa finestra viene utilizzata il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> per intercettare tutti i messaggi.

trans-unit.source: It also serves as a unified canvas on which to paint a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre utile come un'area di disegno unificata sulla quale disegnare un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to translate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> da convertire.

trans-unit.source: Returns the location of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> translated to adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la posizione di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> convertita in coordinate della finestra Adorner.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> value indicating the location of <paramref name="c" /> in adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Valore <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> che indica la posizione di <paramref name="c" />, espressa in coordinate della finestra di strutturazione.

trans-unit.source: The following code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> class.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente fa parte di un esempio più esaustivo disponibile per la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> at the top of the behavior stack without removing it.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> all'inizio dello stack di comportamenti senza rimuoverlo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> at the top of the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> all'inizio dello stack di comportamenti.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse usate da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Dispose%2A> dopo aver terminato di utilizzare l'oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Dispose%2A> lascia l'oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> in una condizione di inutilizzabilità.

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Dopo la chiamata <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Dispose%2A>, è necessario rilasciare tutti i riferimenti al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> in modo che il garbage collector può recuperare la memoria che di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> occupata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [implementazione di un metodo Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare sempre il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Dispose%2A> prima di rilasciare l'ultimo riferimento a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, le risorse utilizzate non verranno liberate finché il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> dell'oggetto `Finalize` non viene richiamato dal Garbage Collector.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> completes a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" /> completa un'operazione di trascinamento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.EndDrag> event immediately after the drag operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> genera il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.EndDrag> evento subito dopo l'operazione di trascinamento è stata completata.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [gestione e generazione di eventi](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> preceding the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> to be returned.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> che precede l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> da restituire.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> immediately after the given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> in the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> immediatamente dopo l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> nello stack dei comportamenti.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> immediately after <paramref name="behavior" /> in the behavior stack, or <see langword="null" /> if there is no following behavior.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> che segue immediatamente <paramref name="behavior" /> nello stack di comportamenti oppure <see langword="null" /> se non è disponibile alcun comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the adorner window of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.
trans-unit.target: Invalida la finestra di strutturazione di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the adorner window of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.
trans-unit.target: Invalida la finestra di strutturazione di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Invalidate%2A> method forces a refresh of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> objects and, in turn, all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> objects.
trans-unit.target: La chiamata di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Invalidate%2A> metodo forza un aggiornamento di tutti <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner> oggetti e, a sua volta, tutti <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The rectangular area to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: Area rettangolare da invalidare.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates, within the adorner window, the specified area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.
trans-unit.target: Invalida, all'interno della finestra di strutturazione, l'area specificata di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Invalidate%2A> method will force a refresh of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A> and, in turn, all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Glyphs%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Invalidate%2A> metodo impone l'aggiornamento di tutti i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A> e, a sua volta, tutti <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Glyphs%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The region to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: Area da invalidare.

trans-unit.source: Invalidates, within the adorner window, the specified area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.
trans-unit.target: Invalida, all'interno della finestra di strutturazione, l'area specificata di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Invalidate%2A> method will force a refresh of all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A> and, in turn, all <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Glyphs%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Invalidate%2A> metodo impone l'aggiornamento di tutti i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.Adorners%2A> e, a sua volta, tutti <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Adorner.Glyphs%2A>.

trans-unit.source: An adorner window's handle.
trans-unit.target: Handle della finestra di strumenti decorativi.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> in a handle's coordinate system.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> nel sistema di coordinate di un handle.

trans-unit.source: Converts a point in a handle's coordinate system to the adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Converte un punto espresso nel sistema di coordinate di un handle nelle coordinate della finestra di strumenti decorativi.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> in the adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> nelle coordinate della finestra di strutturazione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> to remove from the stack.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> da rimuovere dallo stack.

trans-unit.source: Removes and returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> at the top of the stack.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove e restituisce l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> all'inizio dello stack.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> that was removed from the stack.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> che è stato rimosso dallo stack.

trans-unit.source: Removes the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> from the behavior stack internally maintained by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove l'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> dallo stack di comportamenti gestito internamente dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> stack is empty.
trans-unit.target: Lo stack di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> è vuoto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> to push.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> da inserire.

trans-unit.source: Pushes a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> onto the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> nello stack di comportamenti.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.PushBehavior%2A> method is often performed by means of a hit-tested <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.PushBehavior%2A> metodo viene spesso eseguito tramite un hit testing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="behavior" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="behavior" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> to push.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> da inserire.

trans-unit.source: Pushes a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> onto the behavior stack and assigns mouse capture to the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior" /> nello stack di comportamenti e assegna il mouse capture al comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Pushing a capture behavior is often done through a hit-tested <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.
trans-unit.target: Inserimento di un comportamento di acquisizione viene spesso eseguito tramite un hit testing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.

trans-unit.source: If a behavior calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.PushCaptureBehavior%2A> method and mouse capture is lost, the behavior's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnLoseCapture%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Se chiama un comportamento di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.PushCaptureBehavior%2A> (metodo) e il mouse capture viene perso, il comportamento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnLoseCapture%2A> metodo viene chiamato.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="behavior" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="behavior" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> value to transform.
trans-unit.target: Valore <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> da trasformare.

trans-unit.source: Translates a point in screen coordinates into the adorner window coordinates of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.
trans-unit.target: Converte un punto espresso in coordinate dello schermo in coordinate della finestra di strutturazione di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService" />.

trans-unit.source: The transformed <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> value, in adorner window coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Valore di <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> trasformato, espresso in coordinate della finestra di strutturazione.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current selection should be refreshed.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando è necessario aggiornare la selezione corrente.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [gestione e generazione di eventi](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: Synchronizes all selection glyphs.
trans-unit.target: Sincronizza tutti i glifi di selezione.
